actionConfiguration.body:
WITH ma_doc_with_nam AS (
  SELECT 
    *,
    CASE 
      WHEN ngay_tiep_nhan IS NOT NULL THEN EXTRACT(YEAR FROM ngay_tiep_nhan)::text
      ELSE 'Không rõ'
    END AS nam
  FROM public.ma_doc
)
SELECT 
  nam,
  trang_thai,
  COUNT(*) AS so_luong
FROM ma_doc_with_nam
GROUP BY nam, trang_thai
ORDER BY 
  CASE 
    WHEN nam ~ '^\d+$' THEN CAST(nam AS INT)
    ELSE 9999
  END,
  trang_thai;
